metadata.title: USN-4801-1 -- ROOT vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that ROOT incorrectly handled certain input arguments. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4801-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libroot-misc-table-dev - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libroot-misc-minicern-dev - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libroot-graf2d-postscript5.34 - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 root-plugin-sql-odbc - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libroot-net-auth5.34 - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libroot-misc-memstat5.34 - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 root-plugin-math-minuit2 - 5.34.14-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 libroot-core-dev -
